db:abstract.db:para: Emulated const pointer to QVariant based on a pointer.
This class was introduced in Qt 6.0.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: QVariantConstPointer wraps a QVariant and returns it from its operator*(). This makes it suitable as replacement for an actual const pointer. We cannot return an actual const pointer from generic iterators as the iterators don't hold an actual QVariant.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QVariantConstPointer::QVariantConstPointer(QVariant variant)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a QVariantConstPointer from a variant.

db:section.db:title: QVariant QVariantConstPointer::operator*() const
db:section.db:para: Dereferences the QVariantConstPointer to retrieve its internal QVariant.

db:section.db:title: const QVariant *QVariantConstPointer::operator->() const
db:section.db:para: Returns a const pointer to the QVariant, conforming to the conventions for operator->().
